meanings.definition: Having or showing intelligence or mental capacity.
meanings.sent1: She is a brainy student who always gets good grades.
meanings.sent2: The scientist made a brainy discovery that changed the world.
meanings.sent3: The brainy detective quickly solved the mystery with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her brainy ideas sparked innovation in the field of technology.
meanings.sent5: The brainy professor's lectures were always engaging and informative.

meanings.definition: A person who is intelligent or clever.
meanings.sent1: My sister is the brainy one in our family, always coming up with clever solutions.
meanings.sent2: The brainy student won the math competition with ease.
meanings.sent3: The brainy inventor created a device that could read minds.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the brainy guru of the tech industry.
meanings.sent5: The brainy author's books were filled with clever twists and turns.
